overview: While hanging with the cool kids, Chris has to chooses to ignore his friendship with the less cool Joy. Suddenly, Superbook sends Joy, Chris, and Gizmo to a time when Peter denies Jesus three times. This helps Chris understand the value of true friendship. ~ Luke 22:32
tagline: You can find forgiveness and restoration with friends no matter how big your mistake.
title: Superbook: Peter's Denial
